CustomField.formula:
if ( Active__c && !isblank(text(How_to_Summarize__c)) && !isblank(Source_Field__c) && !isblank(Target_Field__c) && ( CONTAINS(Source_Field__c, '.') || isblank(Source_Field_Type__c) || (!CONTAINS(lower(Source_Field_Type__c), 'object') && !CONTAINS(lower(Target_Field_Type__c), 'object') )) && ( CONTAINS(Source_Field__c, '.') || Source_Field_Type__c = Target_Field_Type__c || ( contains(text(How_to_Summarize__c), 'Count') = true && ( Target_Field_Type__c = 'Currency' || Target_Field_Type__c = 'Double') ) || ( (Source_Field_Type__c = 'Currency' || Source_Field_Type__c = 'Double' ) && (Target_Field_Type__c = 'Currency' || Target_Field_Type__c = 'Double' ) ) || ( contains(lower(Source_Field_Type__c), 'picklist') && Target_Field_Type__c = 'String' )), 'Ready',
if(!Active__c, 'Not Active' +br(), '') + if (isblank(text(How_to_Summarize__c)), 'No Summarization Selected' +br(), '') + if (isblank(Source_Field__c), 'Needs Source Field' +br(), '') + if (isblank(Target_Field__c), 'Needs Target Field' +br(), '') + if ( !CONTAINS(Source_Field__c, '.') && CONTAINS(lower(Source_Field_Type__c), 'object') , Source_Field_Type__c +br(), '') + if (CONTAINS(lower(Target_Field_Type__c), 'object') , Target_Field_Type__c +br(), '') + if ( contains(text(How_to_Summarize__c), 'Count') = true && Target_Field_Type__c != 'Currency' && Target_Field_Type__c != 'Double', 'Target field type not compatible with Count action', if ( !CONTAINS(Source_Field__c, '.') && Source_Field_Type__c != Target_Field_Type__c, "Source and Target field types don't match", 'Not Ready - unknown reason')) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A summary of any issues with the configuration of the field. Â If all is good, it'll show "Ready"
